Name: Chhiek
description:
Chhiek is a 55 year old woman who lives in a 1-bedroom house with access to electricity, with 6 other family members.

Chhiek works as a farmer but struggles with charcoal and energy expenses. She spends a total of USD 32 a month on all of her fuel and electricity expenses.

Chhiek bought the ACE One cookstove to help her family save the money they spend every month on fuel and also help them access solar electricity to charge their mobile devices any time for free. The ACE One clean cookstove is biomass and solar powered.

For more information on the ACE One cookstove please visit www.africancleanenergy.com and Facebook @African Clean Energy.
